reports.title: name="Monster Hunter: World" appid="582010" target_framerate="40-49 FPS title="Plays pretty well at a locked 45FPS"

data.summary: Plays pretty well at a locked 45FPS
data.game_graphics_settings:
#### Advanced Graphics Settings
- **Image Quality:** High
- **Texture Quality:** 1024
- **Ambient Occlusion:** Low
- **Volume Rendering Quality:** Low
- **Shadow Quality:** Low
- **Capsule AO:** On
- **Contact Shadows:** Off
- **Anti-Aliasing:** TAA + FXAA
- **LOD Bias:** Variable
- **Max LOD Level:** -1
- **Foliage Sway:** On
- **Subsurface Scattering:** Off
- **Screen Space Reflection:** Off
- **Anisotropic Filtering:** High
- **Water Reflection:** Off
- **Snow Quality:** Low
- **SH Diffuse Quality:** Low
- **Dynamic Range:** 32-Bit
- **Motion Blur:** Off
- **DOF (Depth of Field):** Off
- **Vignette Effects:** Normal
- **Z-Prepass:** On
data.additional_notes: Plays pretty much locked at 45FPS on adventures and in the hub. Some settings are turned off due to my own personal preference (Motion blur, DOF, etc) but I observed no impact to performance with these enabled.
